{{cpp/title|swap&lt;small&gt;(std::packaged_task)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/thread/packaged_task/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
template&lt; class Function, class... Args &gt;
void swap( packaged_task&lt;Function(Args...)&gt; &amp;lhs, 
           packaged_task&lt;Function(Args...)&gt; &amp;rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Specializes the {{lc|std::swap}} algorithm for {{lc|std::packaged_task}}. Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|packaged tasks whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
